page.title: 04MR PLANT
page.content: MR.PLANT HE CAME FROM PETERBOROUGH. HE SAID THE AREA OF WALTON HAD NOT CHANGED A LOT. HE WORKED IN PETERBOROUGH AND ENJOYED HIS JOB. HE LIKED THE AREA QUITE A LOT WHEN HE WAS YOUNG. HE HAD LIVED IN THAT HOUSE FOR 28 YEARS. HE HAS GOT TWO CHILDREN. HE TOLD US WHAT THE AREA WAS LIKE WHEN HE WAS YOUNG HE SAID THERE WERE NOT AS MANY CARS AND MORE BIKES AND THERE WERE TRAMS RUNNING FROM WALTON TO THE CITY CENTRE.THE AREA WAS ALSO A LOT SMALLER AND THERE WERE PRIVATE SHOPS. HE WENT TO WALTON SCHOOL AND LEFT AT THE AGE OF 14 AND DID NOT LIKE IT. HE SHARES ONE CAR WITH HIS WIFE.
